original: COLLIANDER, Per Gösta, Järnhandlare, Sala, f 23/4 09 av dir K O Hj C o Sofia Jonsson, gm Ingalisa Ulvfors. Hal, Påhl-mans hdlsinst. Anst AB Aug Kjelléns järnhdl 27—31, o sed. 34, AB Wolrath & Co Upps 31— 34. Styr.led AB Aug Kj järnhdl, Västmanl 1 jaktv.frn. Odd Fellow. Hobbies: Jakt, filateli.
translated: COLLIANDER, Per Gösta, Iron Merchant, Sala, born 23/4 09, son of director K O Hj C and Sofia Jonsson, married to Ingalisa Ulvfors. Secondary education at Påhlman's Trading Institute. Employed at Aug Kjelléns iron trade company 27-31, and continuously since 34. Employed at AB Wolrath & Co Upps 31-34. Board member of AB Aug Kj's iron trade company, Västmanl, and member of the Swedish Hunting Association. Member of the Odd Fellow fraternity. Hobbies: Hunting, philately.

worksFor.name: AB Aug Kj's iron trade company

career.workplace: AB Aug Kj's iron trade company, Västmanl
